title: Project-Based Information Literacy Education Design for Engineering Graduate Students

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Designed for pre-service/in-service teachers to acquire engineering domain information literacy through project-based learning.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze the latest research trends in engineering fields from academic databases
Learners can apply criteria for evaluating and selecting credible information sources tailored to project requirements
Learners can compile and reconstruct engineering research findings into reports based on critical thinking
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
